data.title: UNESCO study finds 1 in 3 students globally experience cyberbullying
data.snippet: A comprehensive study across 144 countries reveals that online bullying affects roughly one-third of school-age children, with rates highest among 13-15 year olds.

data.title: Twitch streamers call for better harassment protections after coordinated hate raids
data.snippet: Major content creators threaten to leave the platform unless Twitch implements stronger tools to prevent organized harassment campaigns.

data.title: India's new Digital Personal Data Protection Act addresses online harassment
data.snippet: The legislation includes provisions for victims of online harassment to seek expedited removal of harmful content and pursue legal action.

data.title: Study links workplace cyberbullying to 25% increase in employee turnover
data.snippet: Research shows that digital harassment in remote work environments significantly impacts mental health and drives employees to leave organizations.

data.title: Instagram launches AI-powered comment filtering to combat targeted harassment
data.snippet: New machine learning models can detect and hide coordinated harassment comments in real-time, including those using coded language and emoji.
